name: Judgment: Desert Survival Free DLC
detailed_description: Desert Survival is a free DLC that introduces a new, more challenging, game mode. In this mode you will have to not only survive the demon onslaught, but also the hardships of the desert. Getting food and water is much harder, scavenge and loot are harder to come by in this desolated area, and only a small portion of your base is fit for planting and farming.
